company_content:
Included in 2009 and also headquartered in the USA, OpenXcell is a leading resource hiring and software application services advancement company understood for supplying the top 1% skill in the IT sector, with extremely experienced sources of over one decade of domain name experience. Our unmatched skill employment techniques guarantee the very best resource choice as well as growth of cutting-edge remedies that are futuristic and also easy to use. We have progressed right into a one-stop destination offering end-to-end Service & Technology Appointment.
OpenXcell has created a costs brand name image by sticking to rigorous timelines as well as high-grade deliverables. Our customer-oriented functioning version makes us more reputable as well as conveniently approachable to our customers.
Facts & Figures:
      •  The global provider with offices in India & USA
      •  5000+ resumes screened every quarter and more than 300+ resources hired annually
      •  3000+ mobile applications submitted in App Shops which are presently utilized by 15 million+ active customers around the world
      •  2000+ tailored software application solutions delivered
      •  Partnered with 750+ entrepreneurs around the world
      •  The core team of 500+ staff members with solid expertise in the technical domain name
      •  Take advantage of the latest devices, strategies, approaches, and techniques to provide robust services that generate earnings for our customers
      •  CMMI Degree 3 and ISO 9001: 2008 accredited company
      •  Team of certified SCRUM programmers & industry-specific SME (Topic Professionals).
      •  Associated with global associations like NASSCOM as well as IGDA.
      •  Client count on is of miraculous relevance to us. To make certain the discretion of the task, we authorize the Non-Disclosure Contract (NDA) with our customers.
      •  Dexterous strategy as well as result-driven method.
      •  Built as a part of our business approach, our 'ValueShore' version lays high focus on developing improved worth for our customers.
      •  We are your perfect offshore group structure, app development & software program growth companion. Connect with us to transform your suggestion into a revenue-generating company service.
